Posts.Content: Having the 5th dose of FEC on Tuesday! One more after that then i'm done! Radiotherapy  after that, but i was told that is buns compared to chemo!!!! Not looking forward to Tuesday as the symptoms towards the end of the chemo seems to get a bit harder to handle,or is it i'm getting a bit fed up coping with feeling absolutely horrible all the time!! But i'm carrying on looking forward to the last one, hope every one is feeling good and coping well.....xxx
Posts.Title: coping with chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Sorry to hear your arm causing problems! My arm seems to be playing up lately too, i have a pic line in and have been aching and having trouble getting blood from it etc!! Sorry to hear also your margins wasn't clear and you need another op!! i was lucky enough to have clear margins as i caught it quite early, so hope after chemo and 4 weeks of radio therapy i will be done!! I also can't wait to get my life back as i'm always exhausted and my head is so cloudy i can't seem to think straight!!!  That's awful your are going through a divorce, BIG HUGS,keep in touch, and i hope everything turns out well for you after your op, and you get back to full health.....   Caz, xxxx
Posts.Title: coping with chemo
